name: CreateReleaseNote
description:
Create a new note on a release in Freshservice.

Use this tool to add a new note to an existing release in Freshservice, providing collaborative and up-to-date information.

parameters.name: release_id_for_note_creation
parameters.description: ID of the release to which the new note is being added. It must be an integer.

value_schema.description: ID of release for which notes are to be retrieved

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the release note. This must be an integer.

parameters.name: creator_user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note. This ID is required to identify the author of the release note in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_email_addresses
parameters.description: Email addresses to notify about the release note. Provide as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_body_html
parameters.description: The body of the release note in HTML format. Use this to provide structured content with formatting.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_body_plain_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format, without HTML tags.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_creation_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was created. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_updated_datetime
parameters.description: The datetime when the note was last updated in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: release_id
parameters.description: ID of release for which notes are to be retrieved

value_schema.description: ID of release for which notes are to be retrieved

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notify_emails
parameters.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was created

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
